body: Rereading this gold again, this UB right here just doesn't disappoint

amazing

story wise .. omg .. it's great

I love the concept of “ugly bastard becomes a good guy”. I think there was one other series that did this, but it was more “friendly fat guy helps girls and they love him back”.
I can't wait till the purple haired girl gets some.
I could be perfect without the ugly bastard
Buseettttt banyak amat (ㆁωㆁ)
I accidentally came while laughing wtf lmao

I Read because I like this artist but ugly bastard is a huge turnoff for most people (including me) but I have been desensitized to shit like ugly bastard or ntr so I can read it without post nut clarity fucking me in the ass. But I stayed because how fucking stupid the story is and the comedy but I fucking love it
bbm, so not for me

A million times better than fast and furious, as they do not give me the end in a few weeks I will be disappointed, in addition to 569 pages with humor, good art and even points of reflection, this is a 10/10 and if someone says otherwise, it will be for personal taste
P.551: ITS TIME TO D-D- D- D-D-D- FUCK.
anyone who says this isn't at least a masterpiece is kidding themselves, 569 pages worth of comedy fucking gold/damn arousing art definitely deserves that title, fat ugly bastard or otherwise
This is meh
I do declare this is surprising like dang I don’t if I should like it or say wtf or just be like damn
Nuts, pure nuts, and it's also super weird

Can anyone tell me on how to torrent these long ass named torrents? It's givine me an error: The system cannot find the path specified. Most likely because of the long ass name. This happened on several occasions with other long named doujins. How does one torrent this?

My gosh, I thought I was just going to be reading an ugly bastard manga when I first started this, but it just evolved into an actually deep story. What's going to happen next? Does the old man still have his magic cards? And why is the story so entertaining to read? I was honestly just reading the story instead of fapping. Though, this manga is some pretty good fap material.
Holy Fuck... This shit story is deeper than I thought.

okay like what the actual fuck how did i not know about this piece of national treasure before.
normaly i dont like ugly basterd but this could not have done with out one its perfect the way it is
What the actual fuck? How did this hentai became a fucking magic manga?
569 pages?! I thought we are not allowed to upload the entirety of Oxford English Dictionary
This better not end on that fucking cliffhanger. FINISH THE STORY YOU COWARDS!
Holy shit is it finally fucking done!?! After almost 2 years of this one series did someone finally get off their ass and translate it completely!?

500++ pages ..

Let's go .!!!!!
Why does this hentai have fucking lore
What the. I thought it's already complete but it's still is not
This is quite frankly the greatest thing I have ever read.
Damn almost 600 pages, I think this is the longest story by Marui Maru. His arts are great
569 pages jesus christ
Holy shit this is gettingg interesting
Looks like, I have to remove some of my schedules for this.

Pg. 114... You know, I never thought I'd ever see a fat ugly bastard doing the shoujo main character toast-in-mouth run. Won't be unseeing that one anytime soon. Anyway, great stuff, though I still think Marui Maru's art is at its best when femdom is involved.
